text: Patoyun railway station (, Sindhi: پاٽويون ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official web site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Sindh Category:Railway stations on Mirpur Khas–Nawabshah Branch Line
title: Patoyun railway station
